sentences.sContent: In this case, I genuinely believe in the Buddhist way of thinking.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this case, I genuinely believe in the Buddhist way of thinking.
sentences.sCn: 在这种情况下，我真诚地相信佛教徒的思维方式。

sentences.sContent: On the extreme northwestern outskirts of the city stands the Buddhist temple.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the extreme northwestern outskirts of the city stands the Buddhist temple.
sentences.sCn: 那所佛教寺院位于市郊的最西北角。

sentences.sContent: These were all qualities he recognized in himself, but which all could be improved upon, and so he became a Buddhist.
sentences.sContent_eng: These were all qualities he recognized in himself, but which all could be improved upon, and so he became a Buddhist.
sentences.sCn: 这些特质他都可以在自己的身上找到，但也都还有着可提高的空间，于是他成了一名佛教徒。

trans.tranOther: A Buddhist is a person whose religion is Buddhism
Buddhist means relating or referring to Buddhism
